section.p: This callback reports transport-layer statistics such as packet loss rate and network delay. It is triggered every 2 seconds during the call when the local user receives video packets from a remote user or host.

section.title: Trigger Timing
section.p: During a call, this callback is triggered every 2 seconds when you receive video packets sent by a remote user or host.
This callback is triggered every 2 seconds during the call when the local user receives video packets from a remote user or host.
